org.jasig.cas.authentication

Class AllAuthenticationPolicy

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jasig.cas.authentication.AllAuthenticationPolicy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AuthenticationPolicy

    @Component(value="allAuthenticationPolicy")
public class AllAuthenticationPolicy
extends java.lang.Object
implements AuthenticationPolicy
    Authentication security policy that is satisfied iff all given credentials are successfully authenticated.
    Since:
    4.0.0
